snippet.textDisplay: Sorry for the slow reply, I didn't get the notice!  Yes, Lumberyard uses Lua and has a visual scripting tool.

snippet.textDisplay: Brian Burton does it use Lua Lumberyard?
snippet.textOriginal: Brian Burton does it use Lua Lumberyard?

snippet.textDisplay:
Make sure you check out the Corona Editor plugin for sublime.  It's great!
Corona is my choice for anything 2D or traditional app development.  Lumberyard is my new goto for 3D game dev and VR.
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay:
All you need is your favorite editor to work with Corona.  I switch between Sublime & ZeroBrane when working on Corona.
I'm also a long-time Unity developer, but will be switching to Lumberyard going forward. Lua is the scripting language used in Lumberyard.
